title: Sundown town - Wikipedia
snippet: Sundown towns, also known as sunset towns, gray towns, or sundowner towns, were all-white ... In Connecticut: "Whites Only Within City Limits After Dark".

metatags.author: Leslie Landrigan
metatags.og:title: The Secret History of New England's Sundown Towns - New England Historical Society
metatags.og:description: New England's sundown towns were an open secret among African-Americans and other minorities. They had to leave town by dark, or else.
metatags.twitter:creator: @NEHIST

metatags.twitter:title: In Arbery’s death, an echo of the ‘sundown towns’ that banned and threatened Black people
metatags.og:title: In Arbery’s death, an echo of the ‘sundown towns’ that banned and threatened Black people
metatags.og:description: The signs are gone now, but once they were a part of America’s roadside culture, posted along the highway at the town or county line, a blunt reminder of brutal racism.
